root.name: Epic Tic Tac Toe
root.description: OverviewAn epic game of Tic Tac Toe where players can choose to play as Knights, Orcs, Scientists, or Zombies. It is developed by Blind Fist Software.Players can choose to play with a friend, or even by themselves. When they've finally chosen how many players are going to be in the game, they are required to choose a difficulty -- Easy, Medium, or Hard. Players can also choose whether they want to play Knights vs. Orcs, or Scientists vs. Zombies. After that, it's all Tic Tac Toe on the appropriate "battlefield."
